title: LF Silver+ Jungle for Season 6 Ranked 5s
body:
Our team composition thus far...

Top: http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Ryze+James+Cryin.
Mid: http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=LvL%2041%20Scizor.
ADC: 
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=BlengeSquelch.
Support: http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=TahmumuhaT.

That leaves us with just one spot remaining: jungle. Just as before, my requirements are as follows:

1.) Silver or higher.
2.) English speaking.
3.) Able/willing to voice chat.
4.) Able/willing to practice.
5.) Have a sizable and diverse champion pool.
6.) Friendly and not toxic at all.

Either friend me in game or post here with a link to your OP.GG if you're interested.

replies.body:
Hi

interested in the jungle position.
I' ll send a friends request in game and here is my op.gg
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=wobus
